title: [macOS] Add the arm64 build target
body:
**Description of Change**

Add the targets to build the arm64 architecture into the native binaries for macOS.

Initial builds from local bits with x64 and arm64:
 - [libSkiaSharp.dylib.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/5962654/libSkiaSharp.dylib.zip)
 - [libHarfBuzzSharp.dylib.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/5962655/libHarfBuzzSharp.dylib.zip)

Using this with the existing 2.88.0 preview is just a matter of disabling the built in ones:

```xml
<PropertyGroup>
  <ShouldIncludeNativeSkiaSharp>False</ShouldIncludeNativeSkiaSharp>
</PropertyGroup>
```

The 2.88.x packages are found on the preview feed: `https://aka.ms/skiasharp-eap/index.json`

**Bugs Fixed**

<!-- Provide links to issues here. Ensure that a GitHub issue was created for your feature or bug fix before sending PR. -->

- Related to  #1575
